{{Infobox Berry |name = #15 Figy |image = [[File:Figy.png]] |caption = This Berry is oddly shaped, appearing as if someone took a bite out of it. It is packed full of spicy substances. |growtime = 5m 50s |harvest = 14 berries |replant = 30% |points = 40 |flavor =
*15 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} === Description === '''Figy''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 25, but no more than 80 points of spicy and less than 5 points of all other flavours. [[Cheri]] berries must be unlocked to unlock this berry. === Growth Tables === ==== Growth Stages ==== {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 40 secs || 2 mins 40 secs || 3 mins 50 secs || 5 mins 50 secs - 11 mins 40 secs |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:FigyTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:FigyTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:FigyTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} ==== Ripening Time with Modifiers ==== {| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time |- ! None | 5 mins 50 secs -
11 mins 40 secs |- ! Sprayduck | 3 mins 53 secs -
7 mins 47 secs |} === Flow Chart ===
{| style="text-align: center;" |+ '''Flow Chart to get this berry''' |- | Random
Drop |- | ↓ |- | [[File:Cheri.png|20px]] [[Cheri]] |- | ↓ |- | [[File:Figy.png|20px]] [[Figy]] |}
=== Mutation Strategy === ==== Possible Planting Formations ==== You can fill your [[farm]] in the following way to obtain the Figy berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] |- | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || || || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] |- | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] |} {{Berries}}
